name: Ladder Blasters
description:
THeRe  arE  LadDERs  anD  bLAsTers  aMonG uS !!!11!

Controls: WS to move, D to shoot for Red; IK to move, J to shoot for Cyan

This was a game inspired by playing on the new Among Us map Airship and the ladder animations that go brrrrrrr. I spent a couple of hours over the span of three days to finish this project.  Shoutout to Zach (ReverbSquid#7672) for vibing on the ladders with me :))

CREDITS:

Art by Snowy_Oshawott#7640

Everything else except music by me

Made on Unity

Music: 

Among Us Main Theme from PuffballsUnited

Among Us Drip Theme Song Original (Among Us Trap Remix / Amogus Meme Music) by Leonz on YouTube
